auto_product_desc.title_short: Black Ribbed Top with Broken Heart Embroidery
auto_product_desc.product_description_long: A close-up shot of a black ribbed apparel item, likely a tank top or similar garment, showcasing its texture and design. The fabric features distinct vertical ribbing, suggesting a stretchy and fitted material. Centered on the garment is an embroidered design featuring a red broken heart, accompanied by white cursive text that reads 'No Love, Only Styles'.
key_visual_features: Vertical ribbed texture of the fabric
Contrasting red and white design on black background
prompt_boosters: Highlight the ribbed texture of the garment
